Title: The Chrysanthemum and the Sword
Plot: Don and Pete disregard Roger's plans in order to land a new client.
ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes,offensive language and drug use
GuestStars: Deborah Lacey, Cara Buono, Matt Long, Kevin Rahm, Nora Zehetner, Sab Shimono, Anna Camp, Patrick Cavanaugh, Patricia Bethune, Amy Sloan, Christopher Shea, Randee Heller, Brian Elerding, Timi Prulhiere, Michael Soll
